name: Unimmune.io
description:
Unimmune.io is a simple game where you play as a cell-essence sucker in a body that doesn't fight back!?

Made with only 4 days out of the 5 allotted time due to timezone restrictions.
Also, this game is still made without using a game engine!

V1.0.1 Update:
- Stop Player from camping on the edges of the screen
- Cut movement time-penalty in half
- Fixed tutorial/help screen not showing at all
- Fixed audio/sfx loading errors

 Credits:
Code written by yours truly (yes, flew this one solo),
SFX generated using SFXR on my phone,
I definitely didn't create Dart and Flutter, not even the MaterialIcons.
